SELECT RES3.STADIUM_NAME,RES3.STADIUM_PHOTO,RES3.DATE,RES3.TIME,RES3.RESERVATION_NUMBER,RES3.RESERVATION_DATE,ACCESS_CODE FROM PAYMENT P ,(SELECT RES2.STADIUM_NAME,RES2.STADIUM_PHOTO,RES2.DATE,RES2.TIME,R.RESERVATION_NUMBER,R.RESERVATION_DATE,R.PAYMENT_NUMBER FROM RESERVATION R,(SELECT S.STADIUM_NAME,S.STADIUM_PHOTO,D.DATE,RES1.TIME,RES1.GAME_INDEX FROM STADIUM S, DATE D,(SELECT STADIUM_INDEX,DATE_INDEX,TIME,G.GAME_INDEX FROM TIME T ,(SELECT GAME_INDEX,TIME_INDEX FROM GAME WHERE MEMBER_INDEX = #{value}) G WHERE T.TIME_INDEX LIKE G.TIME_INDEX) RES1 WHERE RES1.STADIUM_INDEX LIKE S.STADIUM_INDEX AND D.DATE_INDEX LIKE RES1.DATE_INDEX) RES2 WHERE R.GAME_INDEX LIKE RES2.GAME_INDEX) RES3 WHERE P.PAYMENT_NUMBER LIKE RES3.PAYMENT_NUMBER;
